code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BACKEND_URL="https://fastapi-react-sqllite-student-feedback.onrender.com";function App(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const[feedbacks,setFeedbacks]=useState([]);const fetchFeedbacks=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("".concat(BACKEND_URL,"/feedback"));setFeedbacks(res.data);}catch(error){console.error("Failed to fetch feedbacks:",error);}};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post("".concat(BACKEND_URL,"/feedback"),{name,email,message});setName("");setEmail("");setMessage("");fetchFeedbacks();}catch(error){console.error("Failed to submit feedback:",error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchFeedbacks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Student Feedback Form"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email",type:"email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Message",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"All Feedbacks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:feedbacks.map((f,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:f.name}),": ",f.message]},i))})]});}export default App;
